actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to require the Architect of the Capitol to cause all exterior wood surfaces of the U.S. Capitol Building to be suitably painted;

summary.text: Directs the Architect of the Capitol to paint all exterior wood surfaces of the United States Capitol Building.

titles.title: A bill to require the Architect of the Capitol to cause all exterior wood surfaces of the U.S. Capitol Building to be suitably painted;
